item.description:
Let's get together for a drink or two at the ideal location for commuters.

******THIS PLACE IS ACTUALLY IN THE SUBWAY STATION and NOT TO BE CONFUSED WITH THE OTHER CLARKES IN FANEUIL HALL********

Get there when you can. I will arrive at 5 and hang until about 7.
The first new member who finds me (I'll be wearing a green turtleneck), gets a free drink. Don't be shy...Say hi
Catch up or meet up with new and familiar folks before you head home.

Here's Clarke's at South Station link but not sure how current the information is.

PLEASE MAINTAIN YOUR OWN TAB OR PAY AS YOU ORDER - THANK YOU
item.how_to_find_us: Seated at the bar tables against the walls with the high stools, wearing a green turtleneck.
item.name: Pre Turkey Tuesday Happy Hour
